titleStmt.title: Londons returne, after the decrease of the sicknes in a sermon (appointed for the Crosse) but preached in St. Pauls Church. Ianuary 8. 1637. By O.W. p.
titleStmt.author: Whitbie, Oliver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. and I. Okes; and are to bee sold by Richard Whitaker, at the signe of the Kings Armes in Saint Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
